textures: t.x = 0.0;  for_each(t.test, query.get_riders, { t.x = (t.test -> q.property('property:enderite_armor_invis')); }); return t.x > 0 ? texture.additive : texture.default;

materials.*: variable.is_enchanted ? material.enchanted : (t.x = 0.0;  for_each(t.test, query.get_riders, { t.x = (t.test -> q.property('property:enderite_armor_invis')); }); return t.x > 0 ? material.additive : material.default);
